title: SoloQ

embed.description: Riot Pls is our ongoing effort to share our vision for League of Legends and to keep players in the loop as to what's going on back at Riot HQ. Hey everyone, New001 here-lead producer on League of Legends-for the ranked edition of Riot Pls.

body:
So, Diamond+ Are getting the great system that is SoloQ back.

Excellent, but what about EVERY rank up until then, that has to suffer through long queues and players who desire the same positions, cramming Dynamic Queue?

Thoughts?


-Evolutionist, OCE.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Evolutionist,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jPzlsneb,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-24T23:34:41.880+0000)
>
> So, Diamond+ Are getting the great system that is SoloQ back.
> 
> Excellent, but what about EVERY rank up until then, that has to suffer through long queues and players who desire the same positions, cramming Dynamic Queue?
> 
> Thoughts?
> 
> 
> -Evolutionist, OCE.

so what im hearing from you is "they are improving on the current which is good but im gonna complain cuz im a whiney lil bitch" does that convey what you ment to get across?

More to come soon, in late September. 

> First off, making these changes now doesn’t mean we think we’re finished with ranked. This is just what’s going to be happening in the immediate future, and we’re specifically focusing on high elo because that’s where the problems are the most extreme. There will be more changes for 2017, and they will not just be for Diamond and above. We’re not trying to neglect other players, we just need some more time before we make our next announcement. Expect that in September.
 **Riot Calad**
Oh ok so my 6/7 minute queue time is normal for high silver?
